wpi.hw.xyzco
Class GateController

java.lang.Object
  wpi.hw.xyzco.GateController

public class GateController
extends java.lang.Object

This class the signals to the gate control hardware developed by the XYZ Company. The control has a minimal interface. Once it is initialized, it accepts open and close signals.

Version:
May 17, 2012
Author:
gpollice

Constructor Summary
GateController(java.lang.String id)
           Initializes the gate controlled by this object.

Constructor Detail

GateController

public GateController(java.lang.String id)
               throws GateControllerException

Initializes the gate controlled by this object. The gate will be placed in the closed position.

Parameters:
id - the ID of the gate. This is the hardware address used to communicate with the control hardware.
Throws:
GateControllerException - if the initialization fails
Method Detail

open

public void open()
          throws GateControllerException

Opens the gate controlled by this object. If the gate is already open, then this method has no effect.

Throws:
GateControllerException - if the gate cannot be opened

close

public void close()
           throws GateControllerException

Closes the gate controlled by this object. If the gate is already closed, then this method has no effect.

Throws:
GateControllerException - if the gate cannot be closed

calibrate

public void calibrate()
               throws GateControllerException

Calibrate the gate. This performs operations that calibrates all of the sensors and actuators so that they perform in a canonical manner.

Throws:
GateControllerException - if there are any hardware problems that would cause the calibration to fail

performDiagnostic

public java.lang.String performDiagnostic(int diagnostic)
                                   throws GateControllerException

Perform a diagnostic on the gate controller and return a description of the results.

Parameters:
diagnostic - the diagnostic code
Returns:
a description of the results—a short report of the diagnostic results
Throws:
GateControllerException - if there are any hardware problems that would cause the diagnostic to be unable to run properly
